Row.Text: [B]Plundering[/B] was an important part of [B]Republic of Pirates's[/B] identity.

No one can watch the whole sea. As trade grows, so do the chances for plunder. Pirates grow increasingly organized and increasingly bold. It is only a matter of time before they make a bid for something greater.
[B]Edward Teach[/B] was the most feared pirate of the [B]Republic of Pirates[/B].
[B]Amina[/B] and the [B]Republic of Pirates[/B] both like Gold and Resources.
